snippet: The move came a day after three men were detained in London, part of a series of arrests since Britain raised its terrorism threat assessment in August.
abstract: British counterterrorism police arrest and detain six terrorism suspects in raids across southern England, raising concerns that the rise of the Islamic State has helped foment jihadism.
lead_paragraph: The move came a day after three men were detained in London, part of a series of arrests since Britain raised its terrorism threat assessment in August.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
